HCBaseMatcher Class Reference

Base class for all Matcher implementations. More...

Inherits NSObject, and HCMatcher-p.

Inherited by HCAllOf, HCAnyOf, HCDescribedAs, HCInvocationMatcher, HCIs, HCIsAnything, HCIsCloseTo, HCIsCollectionContaining, HCIsCollectionOnlyContaining, HCIsDictionaryContaining, HCIsDictionaryContainingKey, HCIsDictionaryContainingValue, HCIsEqual, HCIsEqualIgnoringCase, HCIsEqualIgnoringWhiteSpace, HCIsIn, HCIsInstanceOf, HCIsNil, HCIsNot, HCIsSame, HCOrderingComparison, and HCSubstringMatcher.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for all Matcher implementations.

Most implementations can just implement matches: and let matches:describingMismatchTo: call it. But if it makes more sense to generate the mismatch description during the matching, override matches:describingMismatchTo: and have matches: call it with a nil description.
